column1: How dare you omit Petr Cornelie from your list

“That’s a hell of a team”    Frank Ntilikina, Timothé Luwawu-Cabarrot, Thomas Heurtel, Nicolas Batum, Guerschon Yabusele, Evan Fournier, Nando de Colo, Fenerbahçe	, Vincent Poirier, Andrew Albicy, Gran Canaria, Rudy Gobert, Petr Cornelie, Pau-Lacq-Orthez, Moustapha Fall  Edit - grammer
Are we assume we’re just re-rolling the draft or are you asking me to pick for Philly?  Because if it’s the latter, say hello to Petr Cornelie, Philadelphia.
Who the fuck is Petr Cornelie?  He has to be on a team I don’t watch so I’m gonna say magic or hornets
